DESCRIPTION

American biologist Michael (David Henry) and his colleague Shenya (Polina Filonenko) travel to South Ossetia to research the behaviour of butterflies there. Shortly after they have set up their night-vision cameras they find themselves in the middle of the Georgian offensive. Their cameras film how the tanks advance, firing grenades and leaving entire localities in flames.
